topicTitle: Don't You Hate When These Things Happen

posts.postText:
1. Innocent and Traitor shooting at each other, but innocent didn't call the traitor out, and you accidentally kill the innocent
2. People ignore your last words/call out
3. Got call out for no reason either being innocent or traitor
4. You kill a traitor, get declared proven by three people, get the traitor's traitor weapon, then get killed by another inno who didnt pay attention

5. Realize "OSHIT, THIS ISNT SPAM BOX" 
(move this please)
Idunno what a thread about TTT would be doing in the spam box, but meh.

>> 1. Innocent and Traitor shooting at each other, but innocent didn't call the traitor out, and you accidentally kill the innocent
 
I hate it when people do this, because it's RDM.

Unless you clearly know who had shot first (Even then it's sketchy because of course they could have DNA or some other reason) or one of the people are called out,  NEVER  join in on a battle between two people if you're unclear of who the traitor is. Just wait till it's over and then deal with it.

Too many people see other people shooting and think "HEY I MUST BE ABLE TO SHOOT THEM TOO" and cause problems that shouldn't arise in the first place.

hate it when some1 is called out by multiple people, but inno people dont pay attention and end up dieing
even seen some were they try to claim the T rdm'd them
die a little bit inside when i see that happen :|

>> hate it when some1 is called out by multiple people, but inno people dont pay attention and end up dieing
even seen some were they try to claim the T rdm'd them
die a little bit inside when i see that happen :| 

#2. People ignore last words/ call out
oh yea...i totally saw that lol
